parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   ContainerGroup: elastic container instance
*   ImageCache: image cache
*   DataCache: data cache
*   VirtualNode: virtual node

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags that are added to the resource.
